[i]Destined to Win[/i] – Other creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional shield counter on them. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
[i]Feroxi Champion[/i] – Whenever a creature attacks you, its controller may pay {1}. If they do not, you may put a creature from your hand onto the battlefield blocking the attacking creature.
